author: gabrielaxel
title: Global Change Mgmt Operating System
description: Existing governance systems do not support large-scale constructive coordinated actions that bring resources & solutions to world problems.
solution: An information collection system designed to support collaborative international development, solutions implementation, & resource delivery.
experience: PhD in human cognition and blockchain/AI ethics, worked w/ SingularityNET, created new governance approaches, partners with WSS (attached).
